publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4508 Jackie Baillie: Helensburgh and Lomond Highland Heatwave—That the Parliament congratulates the Helensburgh and Lomond Highland Games Committee on its second successful games on 14 June 2009; commends the chairperson, Sephton MacQuire, and all the volunteers for their efforts; welcomes the contribution of £8,750 from the Lottery Awards for All programme; further welcomes the contribution of the Helensburgh and District Pipe Band, Strathclyde Fire and Rescue Pipe Band and clan chieftain Iain MacAulay in opening proceedings; congratulates all those involved in the heavyweight events, highland dancing and youth trail race, and notes the high turnout of spectators both local and national to enjoy the Helensburgh and Lomond Highland Games in a glorious heatwave.

S3M-4508 Jackie Baillie: Helensburgh and Lomond Highland Heatwave—That the Parliament congratulates the Helensburgh and Lomond Highland Games Committee on its second successful games on 14 June 2009; commends the chairperson, Sephton MacQuire, and all the volunteers for their efforts; welcomes the contribution of £8,750 from the Lottery Awards for All programme; further welcomes the contribution of the Helensburgh and District Pipe Band, Strathclyde Fire and Rescue Pipe Band and clan chieftain Iain MacAulay in opening proceedings; congratulates all those involved in the heavyweight events, highland dancing and youth trail race, and notes the high turnout of spectators both local and national to enjoy the Helensburgh and Lomond Highland Games in a glorious heatwave.
